title: School Resumption
content: All students are expected to resume for second term on January 12th, 2026.

title: Inter-House Sports Competition
content: Get ready for the annual Inter-House Sports competition! Houses (Blue, Green, Yellow, Red) should start preparation immediately.

title: WAEC Registration
content: REGISTRATION FOR WASSCE FOR SCHOOL CANDIDATE WILL CLOSE ON THE 6th of FEBRUARY 2026
